Note: "Visa No.15.153" appears on the bottom left corner of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French says there is an Exposition of modern Spanish art, at the Palace of the Beaux-Art in Paris under the patronage of the King Alphonse XIII. The Exposition is April to May 15, 1919 to profit the regions devastations.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
